meanings.sent1: She rewears her favorite dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: He often rewears his old jeans on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The superhero rewears his cape for every mission.
meanings.sent4: The memories rewears like a comfortable sweater.
meanings.sent5: The idea of rewear brings comfort and familiarity.

meanings.definition: To use or be used again.
meanings.sent1: The teacher rewears the same lesson plan every year.
meanings.sent2: The company rewears the packaging for their products.
meanings.sent3: The joke rewears well with different audiences.
meanings.sent4: The song rewears its popularity with each generation.
meanings.sent5: The tradition rewears its significance over time.
